TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BulletedList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class BulletedList Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type BulletedList = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 创建以项目符号格式生成项列表的控件。

span.span: Creates a control that generates a list of items in a bulleted format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件创建使用项目符号进行格式设置的项的列表。Use the control to create a list of items that are formatted with bullets. 若要指定要在控件中显示的单个列表项, 请在控件的开始和结束标记之间放置每个项的对象。To specify the individual list items that you want to appear in a control, place a object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 若要指定要用于在控件中显示列表项的项目符号类型, 请将属性设置为枚举定义的某个项目符号类型。To specify the bullet type to use to display list items in a control, set the property to one of the bullet types that are defined by the enumeration. 下表列出了可用的项目符号样式。The following table lists the available bullet styles. |项目符号样式Bullet style|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||未设置。Not set.| ||数字。A number.| ||小写字母。A lowercase letter.| ||大写字母。An uppercase letter.| ||小写罗马数字。A lowercase Roman numeral.| ||大写字母。An uppercase Roman numeral.| ||实心圆圈。A filled circle.| ||一个空圆圈。An empty circle.| ||实心方形。A filled square.| ||自定义映像。A custom image.| 使用属性可指定开始排序控件中列表项编号的值。 Use the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control. 如果将属性设置为、、或字段 , 则会忽略赋给属性的值。 The value that is assigned to the property is ignored, if the property is set to the , , , or field. 如果将属性的值设置为的值 , 则必须将属性设置为指定图像文件的位置。If you set the property to the value of to specify a custom image for the bullet, you must set the property also to specify the location of the image file. 若要在中指定列表项的显示行为, 请将属性设置为枚举所定义的值之一。To specify the display behavior of the list items in a , set the property to one of the values that are defined by the enumeration. 定义的显示行为是、 和。The defined display behaviors are , , and . 单击超链接时, 它会导航到 URL。When a hyperlink is clicked, it navigates to a URL. 使用属性指定超链接导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to. 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击超链接时显示导航到的网页的框架或窗口。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is navigated to when a hyperlink is clicked. 当属性设置为时, 控件显示列表项作为单击时回发到服务器的链接。 When the property is set to , the control displays list items as links that post back to the server when clicked. 若要以编程方式控制单击链接按钮时执行的操作, 请为事件提供事件处理程序。To programmatically control the actions that are performed when a link button is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 请注意, 和属性从类继承并且不适用于控件。 Note that the and properties are inherited from the class and are not applicable to the control. 使用类的事件数据确定单击中的链接按钮的索引。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked. 该控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将绑定到数据源, 可以使用任何提供的数据绑定机制。To bind the to a data source, you can use any of the provided data-binding mechanisms. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information, see [Binding to Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下, 为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准, 例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```              ``` ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建一个控件, 该控件具有格式设置为链接按钮的列表项。The first code example demonstrates how to create a control with list items that are formatted as link buttons. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用数据绑定来指定列表项, 从而创建一个控件。The second code example demonstrates how to create a control using data binding to specify the list items. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个控件, 该控件具有格式设置为链接按钮的列表项。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control with list items that are formatted as link buttons. 单击列表项时, 将在控件中显示文本。Text is displayed in a control when a list item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassExample/CS/bulletedlistclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassExample/VB/bulletedlistclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用数据绑定来指定列表项, 从而创建一个控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using data binding to specify the list items. 列表项的格式设置为链接按钮。The list items are formatted as link buttons. 单击列表项时, 将在控件中显示文本。Text is displayed in a control when a list item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClassDataBindExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassDataBindExample/CS/bulletedlistclass2databindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClassDataBindExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassDataBindExample/VB/bulletedlistclass2databindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 控件中的每个项目符号显示的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for each bullet in a control.

value.span: 中显示为每个项目符号的图像的路径。

span.span: The path to an image to display as each bullet in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要在控件中显示为每个项目符号的图像的路径。 Use the property to specify the path to an image to display as each bullet in a control. 若要为项目符号指定自定义映像, 还必须将属性设置为值。 To specify a custom image for the bullets, you must also set the property to the value . > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持属性, 因为项目符号本质上是装饰性的, 不提供需要通过辅助技术传达的附加信息。The control does not support the property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology. 但是, 如果想要使用自定义映像向用户传递概念, 则应向每个项目符号列表项添加其他文本, 或使用允许你为每个图像指定替代文本的控件。However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image. 可以指定图像的相对路径或绝对路径。You can specify either a relative or an absolute path to the image. 相对路径将图像的位置与网页的位置相关联, 而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative path relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中, 而无需更新代码。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code. 下面的代码示例演示了图像文件的相对路径:The following code example shows a relative path to an image file: ```csharp \\Images\\image1.jpg ``` ```vb "Images\image1.jpg" ``` 下面的代码示例演示了图像文件的绝对路径:The following code example shows an absolute path to an image file: ```csharp "c:\\MyImagesDir\\image1.jpg" ``` ```vb "c"\MyImagesDir\image1.jpg" ``` 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件并设置属性, 以指定要用于每个项目符号的自定义图像的路径。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property to specify the path to a custom image to use for each bullet. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListBulletImageurl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListBulletImageUrl/CS/bulletimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListBulletImageurl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListBulletImageUrl/VB/bulletimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的项目符号样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the bullet style for the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要应用于控件中列表项的项目符号样式。 Use the property to specify the bullet style to apply to the list items in a control. 使用枚举值之一设置属性。 The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |项目符号样式Bullet style|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||未设置。Not set.| ||数字。A number.| ||小写字母。A lowercase letter.| ||大写字母。An uppercase letter.| ||小写罗马数字。A lowercase Roman numeral.| ||大写字母。An uppercase Roman numeral.| ||实心圆圈。A filled circle.| ||一个空圆圈。An empty circle.| ||实心方形。A filled square.| ||自定义映像。A custom image.| 通过指定值, 可以为项目符号提供自己的图像。Specifying the value allows you to supply your own image for the bullet. 如果指定值, 则还必须将属性设置为要使用的自定义映像的 URL。If you specify the value, you must also set the property to the URL of the custom image to use. > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持属性, 因为项目符号本质上是装饰性的, 不提供需要通过辅助技术传达的附加信息。The control does not support the property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology. 但是, 如果想要使用自定义映像向用户传递概念, 则应向每个项目符号列表项添加其他文本, 或使用允许你为每个图像指定替代文本的控件。However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control. 将使用所有可用的枚举值填充控件。A control is populated with all the available enumeration values. 项目符号样式根据用户从列表框中选择的样式更改。The bullet style changes based on the style that the user selects from the list box. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListStylesExample/CS/bulletedliststylescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListStylesExample/VB/bulletedliststylesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 单击 控件中的链接按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a link button in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的列表项时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when a list item in a control is clicked. 若要在控件中启用列表项以引发事件, 必须将属性 first 设置为值。To enable list items in a control to raise the event, the property first must be set to the value . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 控件的事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 单击列表项时, 页面上的控件中将显示一条消息。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. 项目符号列表中的所有链接按钮引发相同的事件。All the link buttons in the bulleted list raise the same event. 若要确定哪个链接按钮引发了事件, 请检查参数。To determine which link button raised the event, the argument is examined. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: BulletedList Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的列表内容的显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display mode of the list content in a control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要应用于控件中列表项的内容的显示行为。 Use the property to specify the display behavior to apply to the content of list items in a control. 使用枚举值之一设置属性。 The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|显示为Displayed as| |-----------|------------------| ||全文.Text.| ||中超.Hyperlinks.| ||链接按钮。Link buttons.| 通过值, 可以将列表内容显示为超链接。The value allows you to display list content as hyperlinks. 单击超链接时, 将导航到 URL。When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL. 使用属性指定超链接导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to. 字段允许将列表内容显示为链接。The field allows you to display list content as links. 单击 " 链接" 按钮后, 使用事件回发到服务器。Use the event to post back to the server when a link button is clicked. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件并设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property. 使用枚举值填充控件 。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 列表项内容的格式根据用户从列表框中选择的显示模式进行更改。The format of the list item content changes based on the display mode that the user selects from the list box. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/CS/bulletedlistdisplaymodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/VB/bulletedlistdisplaymodevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置排序 控件中列表项开始编号的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control.

value.span: 排序 控件中列表项开始编号的值。

span.span: The value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定开始排序控件中列表项编号的值。 Use the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control. 如果将属性设置为、、或值 , 则将忽略分配给该属性的值。 The value that is assigned to the property is ignored, if the property is set to the , , , or values. 尽管属性的值是一个整数, 但并不总是导致项目符号呈现为数字。Although the value of the property is an integer, it does not always cause a bullet to render as a number. 例如, 如果将属性设置为`4` , 并将属性设置为值, 则第一个项目符号将呈现为小写 d。For example, if you set the property to `4` and set the property to the value , the first bullet number will render as a lowercase d. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个控件, 并将属性设置为指定开始控件中列表项编号的值。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in the control. 开始列表项编号的值会根据用户在文本框中输入的值更改。The value that starts the numbering of the list items changes based on the value that the user enters in the text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListFirstBulletNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListFirstBulletNumber/CS/firstbulletnumbercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListFirstBulletNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListFirstBulletNumber/VB/firstbulletnumbervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的列表项时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when a list item in the control is clicked. 若要在控件中启用列表项以引发事件, 必须首先将属性设置为值。To enable list items in a control to raise the event, you must first set the property to the value . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 控件的事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 单击列表项时, 页面上的控件中将显示一条消息。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击项列表中的链接按钮时, 该方法由控件在内部使用。The method is used internally by the control when a link button within the item list is clicked. 包含页指定`eventArgument`参数中单击的链接按钮的索引, 该索引用于初始化对象的属性。The containing page specifies the index of the clicked link button in the `eventArgument` parameter, which is used to initialize the property of a object. 方法通过将初始化 的对象传递给方法来引发事件。 The method raises a event by passing the initialized object to the method. 方法可选择在引发控件的事件之前执行验证。 The method optionally can perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要在单击中的链接按钮时验证页上的一组控件, 请将属性设置为`true` , 并在属性中指定要验证的控件组。To validate a group of controls on the page when a link button within the is clicked, set the property to `true` and specify the group of controls to be validated in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 方法使用 提供的对象将呈现的项内容写入客户端。 The method writes the rendered content of the items to the client using the supplied object. 每一项都由集合中的一个元素表示。Each item is represented by an element in the collection. 如果控件的属性为空, 则不会向中呈现任何内容。If the property of the control is empty, no content is rendered to the . 如果集合中至少有一个列表项, 则 方法使用、 和方法为控件写入 HTML 内容。If there is at least one list item in the collection, the method writes the HTML content for the control using the , , and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基类 中, 属性返回当前选定项的从零开始的索引。In the base class, , the property returns a zero-based index of the currently selected item. 默认值是 -1，表示未选定任何项。The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected. 属性不适用于控件。The property is not applicable to the control. **注意**使用`get` 属性的访问器时, 它始终返回`-1`。**Note** When you use the `get` accessor for the property, it always returns `-1`. 尝试对`set` 属性使用访问器将引发。An attempt to use the `set` accessor for the property raises a . 使用类的事件数据确定单击的控件中的链接按钮的索引。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a control that was clicked. 此属性在可视化设计器中不可绑定, 但在运行时是可绑定的。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，单击 控件中的超链接时在其中显示链接到的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is linked to when a hyperlink in a control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 中的超链接时，在其中加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母 (不区分大小写) 开头, 但下表中列出的特殊值 (以下划线开头) 除外。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values that are listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|呈现直接框架集父项中的内容。Renders the content in the immediate frame-set parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. 使用属性指定在单击控件中的超链接时显示链接到的网页的框架或窗口。 Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is linked to when a hyperlink in a control is clicked. 若要在控件中以超链接的形式显示列表项的内容, 请将属性设置为值。To display the content of the list items as hyperlinks in a control, set the property to the value . 然后, 将每个列表项的属性设置为要导航到的网页的 URL。Then, set the property of each list item to the URL of the Web page to navigate to. 如果未设置该属性, 则在单击超链接时, 将刷新带有焦点的浏览器或窗口。If the property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the hyperlink is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现`target`为属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. XHTML `target` 1.1 文档`anchor`类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果的 呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1, 请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 创建可访问的网页时, 强烈建议你避免使用属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件并设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property. 当用户从列表框中选择显示模式时 , 属性将设置为`_blank` , 以在新的浏览器窗口中显示链接的页面。When the user selects the display mode from the list box, the property is set to `_blank` to display the linked page in a new browser window. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListDisplaymode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/CS/bulletedlistdisplaymodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListDisplaymode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/VB/bulletedlistdisplaymodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是从类继承的, 不适用于控件。 The property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control. > [!NOTE] > 该属性是基于控件中的选定列表项在内部设置的。The property is set internally based on the selected list item in the control. 如果直接设置属性 , 则会引发异常。If you set the property directly, a exception is thrown. 虽然无法访问控件的属性, 但可以使用类的事件数据来确定单击的中的链接按钮的索引。While you cannot access the property of control, you can use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked. 然后, 你可以访问 控件的属性。You can then access the property of the control.
